articles.description: Masi changed the safety car re-start procedure at the end of the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, a move that handed the crown to Red Bull's Max Verstappen, denying Lewis Hamilton a record eighth title.
articles.content:
Axed race director Michael Masi revealed he had received online death threats after the controversy last year that allowed Max Verstappen to claim the Formula One world title.
The Australian changed… [+3353 chars]
